Package bt.peer

Class PeerOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.peer.PeerOptions

  • public class PeerOptions
extends Object
    Provides information on various options, preferences and modes of operations of a particular peer. Instances of this class are immutable; mutator methods return new instances with corresponding changes applied to the original object.
    Since:
    1.2
